title: Winston Churchill about caring about what others think of you.
subtitle: Churchill saw a lot of things, but the effect of old age on how much one cares about what others think was not one of them.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Winston Churchill once said: "When you're 20 years old, you care what everyone thinks, when you're 40 years old, you stop caring about what everyone thinks, and when you're 60 years old, you realize that no one ever thinks about you in the first place."
